sub_title: Associate at M3 Consultancy | Helping organizations improve their operations
summary:
The field of supply chain and operations is constantly changing. New technologies, business developments and the growing importance of sustainability are of everyday's business. With a master's degree in the field of transport, infrastructure & logistics at Delft University of Technology, I could not wait bring my knowledge into practice. 

I am happy to have found my position as an associate at M3 consultancy, a young and vibrant strategy consulting boutique leading in the field of supply chain and operations. The complex problems that we solve, the companies that we help and the impact that we make is what keeps me going! 

If you want to know more, please refer to www.m3consultancy.nl

education.field_of_study: VWO NT/NG | Pre-university Education Nature, Health & Technology

profile_positions.description:
M3 Consultancy is a young and vibrant strategy consulting boutique leading in the field of (digital) operations. Our clients operate within mobility, (online) retail, manufacturing and private equity. We support them in solving strategic challenges with a data-driven, pragmatic and collaborative appraoch. 

In the role of associate, I am responsible of performing analyses that help our customers enhance performance and enable growth. We work for customers whose operations determine a large part of their succes, as well as for private equity investors and their portfolio companies. 

In addition to client work, I am responsible for both organising team activities and defining and improving M3's own sustainability strategy.
profile_positions.title: Associate

profile_positions.description:
Today's cities are facing multiple environmental problems, such as polution, inefficient use of space and traffic congestion. Reducing car ownership is a potential measure to help solving these issues. Therefore, I conducted research in reducing car ownership by means of both implementing shared car systems and parking meausures, such as paid parking and grouping parking space. I did this by means of both a scientific literature review and a stated choice experiment. 

I partially conducted my research at firm Witteveen+Bos, an engineering firm contributing to solving issues as the energy transition, climate adaptation, flooding problems, healthy cities, circular economy and large-scale replacement of infrastructure.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Intern

profile_positions.description:
As society is aging and the demand for sustainable mobility is rising, HTM asked me together with 3 fellow students to come up with a proposal for an inclusive shared mobility system for the elderly in The Hague. 

HTM is the public transport company in and for the The Hague region. The company provides an important part of the overall transport of people by rail and road in The Hague and its surroundings.
profile_positions.title: Intern

volunteer_experiences.description: Stichting Delftsche Opera Compagnie is the foundation responsible for organising the lustrum project for the Delft student orchestra and choir Krashna Musika. In the summer of 2023, Krashna will perform the Carmina Burana by Carl Orff to celebrate the associations's 55th anniversary. The Advisory Board approves strategic and financial decisions of the board.

Krashna Musika is the student orchestra and choir associated with Delft University of Technology. Twice a year, both the choir and orchestra perform well- and lesser-known classical music pieces. A European tour is organised every two years. Both the choir and orchestra are lead by professional conductors. 

2020 - 2022 Chair strategic plan committee: responsible for writing a strategic plan for the association
2017 - 2022 Member audit comittee: responsible for auditing the treasurer, budget and bookkeeping 
2016 - 2017 Treasurer: responsible for the budget, bookkeeping, financial collections and financial reporting

The Dutch National Student Orchestra (Dutch: Nederlands Studenten Orkest, NSO) is a young and national project orchestra. Each year the orchestra is composed with ambitious, talented students, making high-level quality classical music, besides their studies. In the month February, the selected students pause their studies to fully commit to making music. An intensive rehearsal period is followed by an international tour, lead by a renowed Dutch conductor. 

2018 - 2022 Member audit committee: responsible for advising the treasurer and checking the budget
2017 - 2018 Treasurer: responsible for the budget, bookkeeping, financial collections and financial reporting
